isis.stitle: ANTILOCK AIR BRAKE SYSTEM: BENDIX - 3000 - M - 21 MODULATOR VALVE

svcsubsecinfo.para: Perform the tests and inspections presented at the prescribed intervals. If the M - 21 fails to function as described, or leakage is excessive, it should be replaced. Replace only with International-approved parts.

svcproc.title: EVERY 3 MONTHS, 25,000 MILES OR 900 OPERATING HOURS

step1.para: Remove any accumulated debris and contaminants, then visually inspect the outside of the modulator for excessive corrosion and physical damage. Replace if necessary.
Inspect all air lines and wire harnesses connected to the M - 21 for signs of wear or physical damage. Replace as needed.
Test air line fittings for excessive leakage and tighten or replace as necessary.
Perform the OPERATION AND LEAKAGE TESTS described below.
